metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10126 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A heap based buffer overflow inmwifiex_uap_parse_tail_ies function indrivers/net/wireless/marvell/mwifiex/ie.c might lead to memory corruptionand possibly other consequences.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
